page.title: 18A HOLIDAY SURVEY
page.content: The proximity of Gatwick Airport and the Channel ferries, and the area's prosperity combine to make many take holidays ever further afield. Results of our survey are: {Destinations 1975 1985 England 73 37 Wales 8 5 Scotland 11 9 Rest of U.K. 1 3 Spain 11 20 France 6 16 Other Mediterranean 5 18 Central/North Europe 6 13 North/Central America 9 11 Africa/Middle East 3 3 Asia/Pacific 1 1 {No holiday}(over 4 days)35 30 Most use the{roads} 94 73 Greater numbers by{air}32 62 A few go by{rail} 5 6 Only 3 went furthest by{water.
